meanings.definition: A person who watches too much television.
meanings.sent1: My brother is such a vidiot, he never leaves the couch.
meanings.sent2: The vidiot spent the whole weekend binge-watching his favorite show.
meanings.sent3: The vidiot tried to have a conversation with the TV, thinking it would respond.
meanings.sent4: She transformed into a vidiot, glued to the screen like a moth to a flame.
meanings.sent5: The vidiot's eyes were fixed on the TV, oblivious to everything else around.

meanings.definition: A person who is obsessed with watching videos or movies.
meanings.sent1: The young vidiot couldn't stop watching cat videos online.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the vidiot of the group, always suggesting movie nights.
meanings.sent3: The vidiot's idea of a perfect date was a movie marathon.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a cinema, each thought a different film playing for the vidiot.
meanings.sent5: The vidiot's DVD collection was so extensive, it filled an entire room.
